name: Attack+
description: Increase attack by 20

name: Defense+
description: Increase Defense by 20

name: Rage
description: Deal more damage while at low health

name: Drain
description: Lifesteal 10% of the damage you deal

name: Sacrifice
description: Spend health to increase your damage

name: Adrenaline
description: Deal increased damage for each consecutive attack

name: Pierce
description: Have a 20% chance to ignore defenses

name: Spikes
description: Deal guaranteed damage to anyone who attacks you

name: Vengeance
description: Have a 5% chance to instantly kill your opponent when attacked.

name: Opportunity
description: Have a 6% chance to hit a critical

name: Parry
description: Have a 15% chance to block any attack.

name: Bolster
description: Gain the ability to !bolster other players other than yourself (Activate with !bolster [target])

name: Vitality
description: Gain increased stats while at full health

name: Advantage
description: Double the effects of triangle advantage

name: Angelic
description: Healing costs 0 and resurrecting others doesn't cause you to take damage

name: Soulsteal
description: After you kill something, restore full health.

name: Royalty
description: Earn 50% more money

name: Reckless
description: Increase Attack by 50, but decrease Defense by 50

name: Offensive Strike
description: Gain 30% Attack while initiating attack

name: Defensive Stance
description: Gain 30% Defense when attacked

name: Combo
description: Have a higher chance of hitting critical hits after consecutive attacks.

name: Indulgence
description: Gain 50% lifesteal at full health

name: Leech
description: Steal 5% of your opponents remaining health while attacking

name: Confusion
description: Swap the attack and defense of other players during combat

name: Regeneration
description: Charge up a health pack over time and use it with with `!regenerate`

name: LastBreath
description: While you have at least 50% health remaining and take fatal damage, prevent it and set your heal

name: Chthonic
description: You take no damage from sacrificing

name: Odysseus
description: Critical Chance +1%; Double damage dealt by critical hits

name: Coeus
description: Pierce Chance +5% Whenever you pierce through defenses, deal increased damage

name: Dies Irae
description: Rage + 0.3; Rage assumes your health is half of its true value

name: Aegis
description: Block +5%; Whenever you block an attack, you become bolstered

name: Aura Ignition
description: Spikes + 0.2; Spikes also cause players to burn

name: Nemesis
description: Revenge +0.5%; Double the chances of instantly killing your opponent

name: Epinephrine
description: Gain increased defense through consecutive attacks.

name: Speed Healing
description: Healing has a much shorter cooldown

name: Craftsmanship
description: Merging has a much shorter cooldown

name: Pyromancy
description: Enemies you fight become burned and take damage over time

name: Dispel
description: Dispels the opponent's tempo, combo, spikes, and burn.
